porterstemmer
Class Indexer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--porterstemmer.Indexer
public class Indexer
extends java.lang.Object

Class for performing component stem matchings using the porters stemmer

Version:
0.2
Author:
Trent Apted

Constructor Detail

Indexer

public Indexer(java.io.File wordList)
        throws java.io.IOException
Create an Indexer from the file wordList

Parameters:
wordList - a valid File with each entry to stem on a new line
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on an IO error

Indexer

public Indexer(java.util.Iterator it)
Create an Indexer from the words in it

Runs O(n) of the word list but only needs to run once

This fills a hashmap with the component stems of all the words so that match() can run in O(1)

Parameters:
it - an iterator<Object>: the .toString() method is called for words
Method Detail

stem

public java.lang.String stem(java.lang.String str)
return the component stem of string str using Porters Stemmer

Parameters:
str - The string to stem
Returns:
the stem of str

match

public SDPair[] match(java.lang.String s)
Return the component stemming matches to s

Runs in O(1) of the wordList

Parameters:
s - the string to stem and match
Returns:
an array of <distance, string> pairs in the wordList that matched

lookHarder

public java.util.ArrayList lookHarder(java.lang.String s)
Splits s into component words and performs a substring search on all words in the wordList

Runs in O(n) of the wordList

Parameters:
s - the string to scan for
Returns:
an ArrayList of SDPairs containing nodes found, sorted by increasing distance

dump

public void dump()
Deprecated. Map.Entry is no longer public in the JDK, so this doesn't compile

Dump the contents of the stems mapping to stdout

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
A tester: returns the matching for each line given on standard input using the possibilities in "./txt/nodenames.txt"

Parameters:
args - not used
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on an IO error
